constraints.name: order_statistics_query
constraints.description: 查询第 k 个顺序统计量，即在排序后的多重集合中找到第 k 个小的元素
constraints.formal: find the k-th smallest element in the sorted multiset

constraints.name: insertion_operation
constraints.description: 插入一个元素到多重集合中
constraints.formal: insert an element into the multiset

constraints.name: deletion_operation
constraints.description: 删除多重集合中的第 k 个顺序统计量，即删除排序后第 k 个小的元素
constraints.formal: remove the k-th smallest element from the multiset

constraints.name: non_empty_multiset
constraints.description: 多重集合在所有操作后必须非空，否则输出 0
constraints.formal: if the multiset is empty after all operations, output 0
